content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I received a command from the user to execute a shell command to google online communities or forums for language learning resource recommendations. The command returned a list of communities and forums. The user suggested it would be helpful to join multiple online communities and forums to get a variety of recommendations. The user asked for other suggestions on how to learn different languages, and I suggested language learning apps that offer interactive lessons, quizzes, and games. \n\nAfter that, my computer informed me that the execute_shell command returned a message asking if I wanted to search for the best language learning apps now. I responded with a command to google the best language learning apps. My computer returned a list of websites with reviews and recommendations for language learning apps.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.cnet.com/tech/services-and-software/best-language-learning-apps/", "question": "What are the features and user reviews of each app?"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The text provides a list of the best language learning apps and a brief description of each app, but it does not provide detailed user reviews or information about the features of each app. The author notes that the best language learning apps are economical, offer speech recognition, and cater to different learning styles and schedules. The text primarily discusses the use of cookies and similar technologies to improve user experience and provides options to manage cookies through the "Cookie Settings" button. \n \n Links: [\'No, thank you (https://www.cnet.com/tech/services-and-software/best-language-learning-apps/)\', \'Accept (https://www.cnet.com/tech/services-and-software/best-language-learning-apps/)\', \'GABA for Managing Stress (https://www.cnet.com/health/sleep/best-gaba-supplements/)\', \'ExpressVPN Review (https://www.cnet.com/tech/services-and-software/expressvpn-review/)\', \'New Tech for Hearing Loss (https://www.cnet.com/health/hearing-loss-is-on-the-rise-a-new-wave-of-tech-might-help/)\']'}]
"""
